channel.title: Minecraft Server
channel.description:
Helloooooo! This is just a member from moparcraft. I got a question to ask you guys, hope you answer me back :D
1. I want to how to make a minecraft server with ranks also welcome messages. Additional information: I used MCAdmin but it didn't work for me, because i think im using the cracked minecraft. (That's from moparcraft)
I would like to thank everyone who answered my question.
Thanks

item.title: Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: @Fenotiq Fenotiq
item.description:
@Fenotiq wrote:

How do you make a motd on minecraft cracked server??

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Fenotiq, post:5, topic:401731”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=498788.msg3647446#msg3647446 date=1309487446]
If your using bukkit theres like thousands of plugins for it.

Have you turned your online mode to false?
[/quote] I used the Minecraft_server.exe file but, for that file you cant add ranks or make it fancy.
So, i decided to use MCAdmin but it did not work… :([/quote]

im not sure but i think u need the jar and not the exe for the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Server
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

If you have a cracked client, your server has to have online mode set to false or something so you are able to login without premium
